statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={174.6}{e}^{{{0.0357}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0357}}\approx{1.0363448963818}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.0363448963818}-{1}={0.036344896381825}\approx{0.0363} and the percent is 3.63.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
